Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone scored an unbeaten 124 not out
Phil Salt, Jacob Bethell, and Sam Curran all made 50s
Livingstone and Curran combined for a 50 partnership
Livingstone blazed 22 off five deliveries in the final overs
Post-Match Reflections: Liam Livingstone expressed happiness at leading from the front
Livingstone mentioned his desire for more responsibility in England's team
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's fielding was sloppy with four catches dropped and stern words between teammates
England used nine bowlers across the innings
Others: The West Indies captain, Shai Hope, made a superb 117
The West Indies total of 328 was a record ODI total at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium
